name: (Not) a Love Story
description:
• 2D horror game in pixel art
  • Gameplay consists of  exploration and puzzle-solving
  • Creepy and macabre atmosphere
CREDITS

Concept, Coding and Art by Simone "SempliceAgrodolce"
